original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s coconut auction prices grew by 5.29 percent from a week ago after an auction on February 23, data showed.
The average price for 1,000 nuts gained to 85,014.15 from 80,736.72 a week earlier at the weekly auction conducted by Sri Lanka’s Coconut Development Authority.
The highest price was 93,000 rupees for 1,000 nuts up from the previous week’s 92,700 rupees, while the lowest was 73,800 also up from 72,500 rupees.
The auction offered only 399,797 coconuts and 358,567 nuts were sold. (Colombo/Feb 26/2023)
